meanings.sent1: The broken toy was inoperative and could not move.
meanings.sent2: The inoperative machine needed repairs to work again.
meanings.sent3: The inoperative clock made everyone late for the meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her inoperative phone left her feeling disconnected from the world.
meanings.sent5: The inoperative car stranded them in the middle of nowhere.

meanings.definition: Not having any effect or influence
meanings.sent1: The expired coupon was inoperative and could not be used.
meanings.sent2: His apology seemed inoperative as she remained upset.
meanings.sent3: The inoperative advice fell on deaf ears.
meanings.sent4: The inoperative law had no impact on the situation.
meanings.sent5: Her inoperative suggestions were quickly dismissed.
